sentences.english: The fourth section analysis the literary work of people who walk into political field by examination.
sentences.chinese: 第四節分析評述科舉入仕之工商子弟的文學創作活動。

sentences.english: Selecting scholars from grass roots is an important approach in the Imperial Examination.
sentences.chinese: 鄉貢取士是科舉取士的重要途徑之一。

sentences.english: You have earned enough merit to pass the imperial examinations.
sentences.chinese: 你們的福報足以使你們通過科舉考試。

sentences.english: The imperial examination system's rise and fall, was closely related with our culture.
sentences.chinese: 科舉制度的盛衰，與我國文化傳統密切相關。

sentences.english: Mingfa is one of the subjects of imperial examinations in Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 明法是唐代科舉考試的科目之一。

sentences.english: The westward spread into Europe and America of the imperial examination system marked a great contribution of China to world civilization.
sentences.chinese: 科舉考試西傳歐美是中國對世界文明進程的一大貢獻。

sentences.english: Of course, this also is affected by the ancient Chinese imperial examinations.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這也受到古代科舉的影響。

sentences.english: I think mainly when taking a disability from the eight-legged essay in the examination system to explore.
sentences.chinese: 我以爲主要當從八股文取士的科舉制度中去探尋。

sentences.english: The Eight-part essay was one of the special styles for the Imperial Examination from Ming to Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 八股文是明清科舉考試最基本也是最重要的一種文體。

sentences.english: The academic honor plot nightmare which creates by the imperial civil service examination adheres to stickcohere equally likely on their body.
sentences.chinese: 由科舉造成的功名情節像夢魘一樣附着在他們身上。

sentences.english: Imperial selection started at the beginning of Sui Dynasty, so the tendency of examinations began to spread.
sentences.chinese: 在隋朝開始的科舉選才，應試之風開始蔓延。

sentences.english: In old China, this was where the academics from Yunnan province took their entrance exams for the imperial court.
sentences.chinese: 在舊中國，這裏是雲南參加朝廷的科舉考試的學院。

sentences.english: Poem and Fu is an important part of Imperial examination from Tang to Early Northern Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 詩賦是唐代至宋初科舉考試中的重要內容。

sentences.english: The imperial examination system in the Tang Dynasty left a cross-age impact on the intellectual selection in China.
sentences.chinese: 唐代科舉制度在中國選士制度史上有着劃時代的意義。

sentences.english: The weak points of the imperial examination system cannot be regarded as the reason for negative rationality of the Eight - part Essay stylistic style.
sentences.chinese: 科舉制度的弊端不能成爲否定八股文體合理性的理由。

sentences.english: "QingZhengYaZheng" is the marking criterion for the Eight-part Essay of the Imperial examination in Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: “清真雅正”是清代科舉八股文的衡文標準。
